title: Is Bruce Jenner Fervor Good For Trans Community?
teaser: Robert Siegel speaks with freelance journalist Parker Molloy about the notion of celebrity spokespeople and what it means (or doesn't) for trans individuals.
contentencoded:
Robert Siegel speaks with freelance journalist Parker Molloy about her recent piece for Slate regarding Bruce Jenner and about the notion of celebrity spokespeople and what it means (or doesn't) for trans individuals.
